mapper.select: select pdi.id, pdi.code, pdi.charge_person, pdi.supplier_id, pdi.content, pdi.total_price, pdi.create_date, ei.name as supplierName, ei.corporate_representative_phone as supplierPhone from purchase_device_info pdi left join enterprise_info ei on (ei.id = pdi.supplier_id) where 1 = 1 order by pdi.create_date desc
